It was the start of an excellent day of learning at an innovative Social Justice Conference, which included fifteen presentations spread over three sessions, providing a broad selection for participants to choose from. Between sessions there were small breakout groups for sharing and processing. If this sounds like other conferences you have been to, the difference is that the participants were mostly 11 and 12 years old!
